Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #437674 - Update site certificates

TextBody:
Hello Vinay, 

Thank you for your time on a meeting today. 
Here is a recap of the meeting for the record:

We successfully updated NEA Web Console certificates. New certificate was imported to LocalMachineMy store on NEA server and we updated certificate binding for port 443 on NEA server. 

Just for your information the complete instruction for this process is provided in this article in our helpcenter:
Securing the Web Console
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/Application/Reports/Secure.htm

As we agreed, we will keep the ticket open for you to test out NEA Web Console. 
Let me know if you have any additional questions or if additional assistance is needed. Thank you! 

Best regards,
Artem Naskal
Technical Support Engineer EMEA
____________________ _________
Cybersecurity That Works for You

6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com
